Package imagingbook.common.geometry.line

Class SlopeInterceptLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine
      • imagingbook.common.geometry.line.SlopeInterceptLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve2d, ShapeProducer
    public class SlopeInterceptLine
extends AlgebraicLine
    This class represents a line in slope-intercept form: y = k x + d. Instances are immutable. Not all possible lines in the 2D plane can be represented. A SlopeInterceptLine is merely a AlgebraicLine with a special constructor and getter methods for k, d.
